725168f-c.text:
28th Street, north from Hoyt Avenue, showing the Crystal Gardens apartments, some of which were razed for the construction of the Grand Central Parkway. Views 2 and 3 are south on 28th Street toward Hoyt Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  August 3, 1934
Views 1,2,3
